creator: gognu@netscape.net
text:
Adding a pathconvert element to my build.xml causes the following exception:

Ant version 1.4.1 compiled on October 11 2001
Buildfile: build.xml
Detected Java version: 1.4 in: c:\jdk1.4\jre
Detected OS: Windows NT
parsing buildfile c:\home\\Projects\myproject\build.xml with URI = file:c:/hom
e/Projects/myproject/build.xml
Project base dir set to: C:\home\Projects\myproject

BUILD FAILED

c:\home\Projects\myproject\build.xml:17: Unexpected element "pathconvert"
        at org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectHelper.parse(ProjectHelper.java:135)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectHelper.configureProject(ProjectHelper.jav
a:85)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.runBuild(Main.java:439)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.start(Main.java:153)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.main(Main.java:176)

Total time: 1 second
Please attach your build.xml file for me to look into this further.
creator: umagesh@apache.org
umagesh@apache.org
text:
Closing this PR as invalid because User did not give feedback.  Guess user
used <pathconvert> outside a target or something.  Please reopen with
requested details if problem persists.
